title: My Girlfriend Is A World Famous Porn Star | EXTREME LOVE

json.text: MIKE ADKINS: I called my mom. I left her a message and I said, ‘Hey, I have been dating
this girl. I have got to tell you something - she is actually a porn star. She was
like, ‘Oh my God! Thank God! I thought you were going to tell me she was pregnant or something.’
MIKE ADKINS: Mike Adkins,
MIKE ADKINS: 32 years old.
ALLIE HAZE: Thank you!
MIKE ADKINS: I work for an event company.
ALLIE HAZE: I am Allie Haze. I am 30 years old.
ALLIE HAZE: You want cheese on it?
ALLIE HAZE: And I am a adult film actress.
COMM: Award-winning porn star, Allie, and her events planner boyfriend, Mike, started
dating four years ago. The couple met through a mutual
friend and now live together in Las Vegas.
MIKE ADKINS: I had no idea what she did for a living when I first met her.
ALLIE HAZE: When we first got together he didn’t really realise how popular I am or
knowing how active I am; he really didn’t know a lot of that.
MIKE ADKINS: Especially when you see, well, she is successful as she was, you know.
ALLIE HAZE: As I am sir. MIKE ADKINS: As you are.
MIKE ADKINS: I mean, obviously, it’s a different job than, like, being a receptionist or something
like that. But, like, I know I am sure you've played those roles.
MIKE ADKINS: But we can’t, like, base a relationship around what each other’s careers
are. She definitely earns a more comfortable living.
ALLIE HAZE: Yeah, I am, I.. MIKE: I mean we both contribute obviously, but
ALLIE HAZE: Yeah.
ALLIE HAZE: We are a pretty easy going couple. We are not, like, playing the comparing game.
COMM: Allie has starred in over 350 porn films and television series including classics such
as Star Wars XXX-A Porn Parody, Dirty Little Sex Dolls and Secrets Of Sex Island.
MIKE ADKINS: Do we speak together about what she has done at work? No. I don’t think so.
ALLIE HAZE: You ask me if I have had a good
day at work and definitely before I leave you are always, like, ‘What are you working
on today?’ And I will be like, ‘ Oh, boy-girl, girl-girl.’
MIKE ADKINS: Yeah, I know other guys have seen her naked obviously. It doesn’t bother
me that she is with other men as far as work. If it were something that she was just going,
‘I am going out on Friday night, going to hook up with some people’, that would 100% bother me.
Yeah, it’s a job.
ALLIE HAZE: Let’s not forget I have sex with women too. So, it’s not just men.
MIKE ADKINS: That doesn’t bother me, women.
ALLIE HAZE: I  have been in the business for 8 years now.
I never realised how much of a sexual being I really was and that to have an outlet to
participate in and then also use as a career is quite amazing in my opinion. I definitely
won the lottery. I am very thankful.
ALLIE HAZE: One of my favourite parts about being in the business is, like I choose my
partners and most of the partners that I work with are married and are married to co-workers
of mine. And we all know each other, we all hang out.
MIKE ADKINS: We have a lot of friends that are in the industry but it’s not like we
are all having Friday night orgies or anything like that. Like, we will go to dinner and
hang out but just as normal people, normal friends, you know.
ALLIE HAZE: Don’t ruin the fantasy.
MIKE ADKINS: I, I didn’t feel intimidated having sex with a porn star because I didn’t
really look at it that way. ALLIE HAZE: You saw me as a person.
MIKE ADKINS: Yeah, I saw her as a person.
ALLIE HAZE: Obviously, our sex life is good otherwise I still wouldn't be here.
MIKE ADKINS: Wow!
ALLIE HAZE: I am sorry.
MIKE ADKINS: No. ALLIE HAZE: 16. What do you mean no?
ALLIE HAZE: As a woman and as his spouse, I know what would turn him on. So, yeah maybe
I come home and tell stories to my advantage to get some sometimes.
MIKE ADKINS: Yeah, depends on what the scene is.
ALLIE HAZE: Yeah, see there is the smile.
ALLIE HAZE: Depends on what the scene is, I know what he likes to hear about.
MIKE ADKINS: She is definitely one of the more adventurous partners that I have had.
MIKE ADKINS: Nice. Good job.
MIKE ADKINS: Do we ever discuss when she is going to stop? Yes, but not because of like,
‘You should stop!’ or anything like that. It’s more just thinking of what the future
holds and it’s not something that’s going to last forever.
ALLIE HAZE: Yeah, we talk about moving on as far as, like, having a family. Like, when,
okay how long would I work after or will I work - just those kinds of things.
ALLIE HAZE: I have been in the business for 8 years now and there’s fans that I have
had the whole journey. So, it’s almost sad to think that I would ever leave, but there
will be a day.
MIKE ADKINS: Eventually.
ALLIE HAZE: Eventually.
ALLIE HAZE: Michael, I love you this much. I love Michael so much. I can’t even express,
you know, how I feel about him. I am one crazy cookie person. I am a lot to handle.
ALLIE HAZE: I am very grateful to have him by my side.
MIKE ADKINS: I love Allie this much! Very, very much, to the moon and back.
MIKE ADKINS: I do not watch her videos. No, nothing against them - I have just got her
right beside me, you know what I mean.
MIKE ADKINS: I don’t, yeah, I don’t feel the need to, I guess.
ALLIE HAZE: Why watch do me dirty things on film when I can do them to you, right?
MIKE ADKINS: Bingo!
